title: Python for Data Science
introduction: Python has become the go-to programming language for data science and machine learning. It offers an extensive ecosystem of libraries and tools that make data analysis and visualization more accessible.
details: Data science with Python involves using libraries like NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib to manipulate and analyze data. Additionally, Python provides powerful frameworks such as TensorFlow and Scikit-learn for machine learning tasks. Learning Python for data science opens up various career opportunities in fields like data analysis, artificial intelligence, and predictive modeling.
